src/lib/components/DashSign.react.js.description:
DashSign is a canvas for capturing
hand written signatures

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

penColor.description: The pen color of the signature component

backgroundColor.description: The background color of the signature canvas

n_submit.description: The number of times the save button has been clicked

style.description: The style props of signature div

data.description: Base 64 data string for the resulting image

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.
